title: Episode 49 Ft. Bernard Flowers
itunes:title: Episode 49 Ft. Bernard Flowers
description:
Memphis R&B newcomer Bernard Flowers stops by Lip Service to discuss the kind of women he likes, do's and don't's in dating, losing his virginity, threesomes and a whole lot more. He admits to Angela Yee, Gigi Maguire, and Stephanie Santiago that he kisses feet but does not like kissing, as well as the type of porn he would make.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
